replies.bodyText: This test checks that freeing a free slot does not cause any side-effects, so the proposed name would be wrong. The method name is indeed a bit awkward; an alternative might be testFreeingFreeSlotIsIgnored.

replies.bodyText: Ah ok, then let's call testFreeingFreeSlotIsIgnored.
